simple.gui.scrollbox

Class ScrollDialogBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.Widget
      • simple.gui.scrollbox.ScrollBox
        • simple.gui.scrollbox.ScrollDialogBox

  • public class ScrollDialogBox
extends ScrollBox

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int firstIndex
      The first line in lineDisplay to start drawing text from.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lineDisplay
      Represents the lines list but split up into lines whose width does not exceed the space given for text within the scrollBox.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines
      Raw line data.
      protected int numLinesToDisplay
      Maximum number of lines to draw in the scrollBox

    • Field Detail

      • lines

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines
        Raw line data. Each index in lines is made from a call to addLine.

      • lineDisplay

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lineDisplay
        Represents the lines list but split up into lines whose width does not exceed the space given for text within the scrollBox.

      • firstIndex

        protected int firstIndex
        The first line in lineDisplay to start drawing text from.

      • numLinesToDisplay

        protected int numLinesToDisplay
        Maximum number of lines to draw in the scrollBox
